dcterms:creator: L. Pio-Lopez
A. Nizard
K. Friston
G. Pezzulo
dcterms:description: A model that simulates goal-directed reaching movements using a robotic arm, demonstrating how prediction errors influence the control of movements.
dcterms:title: Active Inference model of goal-directed reaching

dcterms:creator: M. Priorelli
I. P. Stoianov
dcterms:description: A model that addresses multi-step tasks and flexible intentions in motor control, allowing for complex movements and tracking of moving targets.
dcterms:title: Active Inference model for multi-step tasks

dcterms:creator: A. Maselli
P. Lanillos
G. Pezzulo
dcterms:description: A model that unifies intentional and conflict-resolution imperatives of motor control, focusing on how unintentional actions arise from multisensory conflicts.
dcterms:title: Active Inference model for unintentional actions

dcterms:creator: L. Perrinet
R. A. Adams
K. J. Friston
dcterms:description: A model that explores the relationship between active inference, eye movements, and oculomotor delays, focusing on how predictions guide eye movements.
dcterms:title: Active Inference model for eye movements

dcterms:creator: K. J. Friston
N. Sajid
D. R. Quiroga-Martinez
T. Parr
C. J. Price
E. Holmes
dcterms:description: A model that simulates the process of active listening, focusing on how auditory perception is influenced by predictions and prior knowledge.
dcterms:title: Active Inference model for auditory perception

dcterms:creator: A. Tschantz
L. Barca
D. Maisto
C. L. Buckley
A. K. Seth
G. Pezzulo
dcterms:description: A model that simulates various forms of interoceptive control, including homeostatic and goal-directed regulation, using active inference.
dcterms:title: Active Inference model for interoceptive processing
